effect.short: Changes the terrain to Psychic Terrain after inflicting damage.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) changes the terrain to psychic terrain.

flavorTexts.text:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mew, attacks
the target with full force. The terrain will be charged
with psychic energy.
